name: Plato Creative
tagline: We're all about smarter business outcomes.
description:
When Plato Creative began in 2007, we had three simple goals in mind: be good to people, be easy to work with and always play the long game. Our culture and values reflect this and it’s what sets us apart.
We talk about being 'one crew' all the time around here. It reminds us that we’re all in this together; we care for and are accountable to each other and our clients.
